title: My Attempt To Make The Map Series StoryMap 'More Maps' Button More Intuitive
featured-image-alt: eyeglasses resting on an open book
teaser: I made some edits to the Esri StoryMap Map Series template to improve the user experience.  I share my solution for better informing users of the purpose of the button that opens a menu of additional map tabs.

title: Esri Map Service Loading & Error Events in Leaflet.js
featured-image-alt: a screen-shot of a CodePen demo
teaser: Hooking into the loading and error events of the Esri Leaflet library, you can add messages to users if a service fails to load on the map.  You can also create a loading screen that disappears after the services have loaded on the map.

title: Converting Parcels to Address Points With a Python Script
featured-image-alt: a line of wooden fence posts
teaser: Using Esri ArcPy search cursors and the centroid properties of polygon layer, you can create a point layer using a Python script.  I developed such a script to assist with a regional data update process for a group of counties.
